name: rip_quick_add
description: Quickly create Google Calendar events from natural language.

scripts.build: rollup -c -i src/background.js -o extension/background.js && rollup -c -i src/popup.js -o extension/popup.js && rollup -c -i src/options.js -o extension/options.js
scripts.watch: rollup -c --watch -i src/background.js -o extension/background.js & rollup -c --watch -i src/popup.js -o extension/popup.js & rollup --watch -c -i src/options.js -o extension/options.js
scripts.firefox-watch: yarn run watch & web-ext run -s extension/

author: Max Timkovich
